sentences.english: Western Guizhou is inhabited by many minority nationalities living in compact communities.
sentences.chinese: 黔西是一個少數民族聚居地。

sentences.english: The gold ore from Zimudang Mine is typical refractory gold ore in south-west area of Guizhou Province.
sentences.chinese: 紫木凼金礦石是黔西南地區較典型的難處理金礦石。

sentences.english: A systematic discussion of stratabound feature of tuff-type gold deposits, southwest Guizhou is conducted.
sentences.chinese: 本文系統討論了黔西南凝灰岩型金礦的層控特徵。

sentences.english: The Guanzhai minefield is situated in southern part of the Qianxi County, Guizhou Province, it possesses abundant coal resources.
sentences.chinese: 官寨井田位於貴州省黔西縣南部，含豐富的煤炭資源。
